record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1927. Fifth row: A. A. Stagg (coach) and A. A. Stagg Jr.; fourth row: Pinnard S. Salamowitz, C. S. Gleason, A. Dystrup, E. B. Berndtson, R. L. Wolff, W. Brand, G. E. Zeigler, and P. H. Kaus; third row: J. M. Jackson, G. L. Hitz, L. E. Smith, W. B. Klein, and C. B. Hegovic; second row: S. S. Frey, A. B. Burg (captain), V. J. Gist, and T. D. Armstrong; first row: J. Cody, R. B. Williams, K. L. Dugan, and J. B. Olwin.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
